name: redux-observable-promise
description: redux-observable-promise is a plugin for redux-observable. It allows to return a promise after an action as been dispatch, and resolve/reject the promise depending of others action. It can be use for redux-form

scripts.build: rm -fr bin && mkdir bin && babel src/index.js --out-file bin/index.js

author: Marc Hurabielle <marc.hurabielle@gmail.com>
